meanings.sent1: The car was crashing into the wall.
meanings.sent2: The waves were crashing against the rocks.
meanings.sent3: The clumsy robot kept crashing into furniture.
meanings.sent4: The thunderstorm sounded like crashing drums in the sky.
meanings.sent5: The crashing waves echoed through the cave.

meanings.sent1: The crashing cymbals startled the audience.
meanings.sent2: The crashing thunder could be heard for miles.
meanings.sent3: The crashing music made everyone dance.
meanings.sent4: The crashing sound of the waterfall was mesmerizing.
meanings.sent5: The crashing door woke up the entire house.

meanings.sent1: The crashing computer left me unable to work.
meanings.sent2: The crashing phone screen was a disaster.
meanings.sent3: The crashing elevator made everyone take the stairs.
meanings.sent4: The crashing engine halted the train's journey.

meanings.definition: Attending a party or event without an invitation.
meanings.sent1: She felt like a crashing guest at the fancy gala.
meanings.sent2: He was a crashing presence at the exclusive party.
meanings.sent3: The crashing arrival caused quite a stir.
meanings.sent4: Their crashing entrance turned heads at the event.
meanings.sent5: The crashing group added unexpected fun to the gathering.
